title: ToDO List
description: A simple and intuitive to-do list app designed to help users organize tasks, set priorities, and stay productive.

title: Food Recipe Finder
description: A recipe search application allowing users to find recipes based on ingredients they have with filtering options.

title: Bondi
description: This project is a professional and fully responsive Landing Page. Designed to adapt seamlessly across all screen sizes.

title: Travello
description: A visually engaging travel website designed to inspire and assist users in planning trips with ease. Features include destination guides, booking tools, and personalized travel recommendations.

title: Static Website
description: This project is a visually stunning Landing Page. Enhanced with smooth and eyecatching JavaScript animations, the page delivers an interactive and engaging user experience.

title: Creative Agency
description: A fully responsive website. Featured a clean, mobilefirst design with interactive elements like color theme and smooth animations.

title: Fylo Landing Page
description: This project is a sleek and modern Landing Page. Designed with a mobile-first, fully responsive layout. The page showcases clean UI components and subtle animations.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A modern, user-friendly furniture e-commerce website offering stylish home. It includes features like shopping cart and a wishlist for a seamless shopping experience.
